<h3 id="X17615">X(17615)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: URSA-MAJOR AND INNER-CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^4-2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^3+4*(b+c)*b*c*a^2+2*(b^4+c^4-(b+c)^2*b*c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c))  :  :
<br>
<b>X(17615) = 3*X(210)-X(1155) = 3*X(3681)+X(5057) = 2*X(3812)-3*X(5123) = 3*X(3814)-X(3874) = X(3869)+3*X(5176) = 2*X(3874)-3*X(5570)</b>
<p>X(17615) lies on these lines: {2,3660}, {4,8}, {9,2078}, {10,12059}, {11,518}, {12,3812}, {36,936}, {63,210}, {65,11236}, {78,12114}, {84,1259}, {100,971}, {145,17622}, {189,5423}, {200,1709}, {295,660}, {513,4468}, {516,14740}, {535,3678}, {914,3932}, {942,11681}, {958,1319}, {960,10944}, {1156,3935}, {1210,3814}, {1858,12607}, {1864,3870}, {1898,3913}, {1903,3692}, {2222,2365}, {2801,6745}, {2975,5044}, {3059,16112}, {3245,12526}, {3306,8581}, {3555,11240}, {3616,17624}, {3621,17648}, {3689,13205}, {3742,10222}, {3873,5748}, {3889,14986}, {4847,15064}, {4855,12680}, {5048,12635}, {5078,5782}, {5223,5536}, {5440,12738}, {5554,12709}, {5744,11575}, {5904,10826}, {6001,6735}, {6068,15726}, {7080,12528}, {8125,17630}, {8126,17631}, {9342,10855}, {10157,11680}, {10528,12711}, {10912,11682}, {11500,13528}, {11679,17617}, {11684,17653}, {11685,17621}, {11686,17623}, {11687,17627}, {11688,17628}, {11690,17629}, {11691,17657}, {12125,17644}, {12389,17645}, {12529,17650}, {12530,17651}, {12531,17652}, {12532,17654}, {12533,17655}, {12534,17656}, {12535,17659}, {14733,17112}</p>
<p>
X(17615) = reflection of X(14733) in X(17112)<br>
X(17615) = anticomplement of X(3660)<br>X(17615) = inverse of X(1851) in the polar circle<br>X(17615) = X(468) of inner-Conway triangle<br>X(17615) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3434, 3681, 17658), (3681, 11678, 329), (3873, 10584, 17626), (5927, 17658, 3434)<br></p>
